command.ban: Ban the given user from this room
command.dm:
Start a direct chat
Use --no-encryption to disable encryption
command.invite: Invite the given user to this room
command.kick: Remove the given user from this room
command.myroomavatar: Set your picture for this room (by mxc-uri)
command.myroomnick: Set your display name for this room
command.op: Set the given user's power level (default: 50)
command.unban: Unban the given user from this room
